CustomField.formula: IF( (Today() - DATE( IF(Today() < DATE( YEAR( TODAY() ) ,01,01), YEAR( TODAY() ) -1, YEAR( TODAY() ) ),01,01)) >= (Open_Date__c - DATE( (IF( Open_Date__c < DATE( YEAR( Open_Date__c ) ,01,01), YEAR( Open_Date__c ) -1, YEAR( Open_Date__c ) ) ),01,01)) , 1, 0 )
CustomField.label: YTD Index
